MultiSearchNotice Class Reference

Class containing information about the contents of a MultiStringSearch. More...

Public Member Functions

  • MultiSearchNotice ()
    To be used before loading from disk and in Utility when doing addElement.
  • uint32 getStringIndex () const
    Returns the index in the map for the string that is represented by the current SearchNotice.
  • uint32 getNbrItems (const MultiStringSearch *mss) const
    Returns the number of items for this notice.
  • const SearchMapItem * getItem (const MultiStringSearch *mss, uint32 offset) const
    Returns item number offset for the notice.
  • uint8 getNameNbr (const MultiStringSearch *mss, uint32 offset) const
    Returns the namenumber used in the item at the same offset.
  • uint8 getWordNbr (const MultiStringSearch *mss, uint32 offset) const
    Returns the word number for the item.
  • uint8 getStringPartMask (const MultiStringSearch *mss, uint32 offset) const
    Returns the search type mask for the notice at offset.

Private Member Functions

  • MultiSearchNotice (uint32 stringIndex, uint32 endOfItems)
    To be used by WriteableMultiStringSearch when creating new notices from a map.

Private Attributes

  • uint32 m_strIdx
    String index of the string that this notice represents.
  • uint32 m_endOfItems
    End index where the items that contain this string ends in the MultiSearchNotice.

Friends

  • class MultiStringSearch
  • class WriteableMultiStringSearch

Detailed Description

Class containing information about the contents of a MultiStringSearch.

Uses the MultiStringSearch to get some of the values.

See also:
SearchMapItem.
